title: by renaming a shared folder is not shared any more
body:
### expected behaviour
having one folder shared, if it is renamed on the shared user should be renamed too.

### actual behaviour
by renaming it, it is not any longer shared.

### steps to reproduce
1. being registered as user1 we share with user2 a folder called a
2. from user1, we rename the folder to a2, it is still shown the "shared" icon, however, by accessing to it, it is not displayed the info about with whom it is shared.
3. by accessing to user2 account, we notice that the a folder has disappear, neither the a2 folder is displayed.

### server configuration
acceptance-testing master_on_apache_with_sqlite
"version":"4.96.10","versionstring":"5.0 rc 2"

### client configuration
browser: firefox and chrome
